content:
Hey all.

I've had an issue on with Claude Desktop on my Windows machine where it often becomes a blank window with no content, only the Claude background colour. This is after not using it for a while and likely in an opened state on one of my screens. I've found Reddit threads of users that seem to have the same issue, or at least the same end result. It's been happening for quite some time.

Is there a fix for this? It feels like it's getting worse as you now have to end the Claude Process which has multiple instances running, not just kill the app with Task Manager like I used to have to do.
